summary: Encapsulates JWT‑based role and permission configuration for the LiteLLM proxy, mapping token claims to internal identifiers, defining required scopes, allowed API routes per role, and caching public keys.
business_intent: Provides fine‑grained, role‑based access control for the LiteLLM service using JWT tokens, enabling admin, team, internal user, and external end‑user permissions, email domain restrictions, and cost‑tracking capabilities.
